snippet: The action will help A.I.G. repay taxpayers for its rescue in the financial crisis.
abstract: American International Group is looking to raise about $6 billion by selling part of its stake in Asian subsidiary AIA Group, in a move to help it repay the federal government for its rescue.
lead_paragraph: The action will help A.I.G. repay taxpayers for its rescue in the financial crisis.

headline.seo: A.I.G. Selling Part of Stake in A.I.A. Group in Asia
headline.main: A.I.G. to Sell Stake in A.I.A.
headline.print_headline: A.I.G. to Sell Stake in A.I.A.
